Table of Contents

Class Tag

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents a user-defined tag for categorizing and organizing articles. Tags are many-to-many with Articles via the ArticleTag join entity.

[Table("Tags")]
public class Tag
Inheritance
object

object.ToString()

Remarks

Tags provide a flexible way to organize articles beyond feed categories. Each tag has a name, optional color for visual identification, and usage statistics.

Key features:

  • Many-to-many relationship with articles through ArticleTag
  • Visual customization with color and optional icon
  • Pin functionality for frequently used tags
  • Visibility control for tag cloud/UI display
  • Usage tracking for popularity metrics

Performance optimizations:

  • Indexed on Name for fast lookups and search
  • Cached UsageCount avoids repeated COUNT queries
  • LastUsedAt for "recent tags" functionality

Initializes a new instance of the Tag class. Sets default values for color, timestamps, and collections.

List of articles associated with this tag. Populated on-demand via the ArticleTags navigation.

Color

Color in hexadecimal format (#RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA). Used for visual differentiation in UI.

[Required]
[MaxLength(9)]
[RegularExpression("^#([A-Fa-f0-9]{6}|[A-Fa-f0-9]{8})$")]
public string Color { get; set; }

Timestamp when the tag was created (UTC).

public DateTime CreatedAt { get; set; }

Calculated darker shade of the tag's color for borders, text, or hover states. Automatically derived from the main color.

[NotMapped]

Internal auto-increment primary key.

IsPinned

Whether this tag is pinned/featured in the UI. Pinned tags appear at the top of tag lists for quick access.

Indicates whether the tag has been used at least once.

IsVisible

Whether this tag is visible in the tag cloud and tag lists. Hidden tags are excluded from most UI views but retain their associations.

public bool IsVisible { get; set; }
